snippet.title: Infest -- Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
***UPDATE*** 
See the latest version here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cPBiokKsv8Y

Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341560/Infest/

Infest is a roguelite deckbuilder where every pixel is physically simulated. Destroy the alien infestation with a carefully-crafted deck of pixel manipulating cards. Burn, freeze, corrode, shock, and melt your environment. Unleash impressive pixel-by-pixel chain reactions and save humanity!
